Service Details: - Provides training, support, consultation and education to foster parents- A support worker works with the foster parents to identify challenges regarding the care of children placed in their homes- Foster parents receive consultation, crisis intervention, debriefing, mediation, and training in crisis management and prevention- The children placed in foster homes also receive support through the program.
Address & Map: 2604 Enterprise Way, #8Kelowna, BC     V1X 7Y5View MapQuest Map
